description: This week’s properties are four-bedroom houses in Larchmont, N.Y., and Bernardsville, N.J.
title: Homes for Sale in New York and New Jersey
title_page: Homes for Sale in New York and New Jersey - The New York Times
maintext:
WESTCHESTER | 10 DANTE Street, LARCHMONT, N.Y.
Four-Bedroom 1948 House
$1.849 million
A four-bedroom, three-bath, 2,220-square-foot home with an arched front garden gate; a foyer; crown molding and oak hardwood floors; a living room with a picture window and a granite fireplace with bluestone hearth and custom mantel; an eat-in kitchen with granite floors and countertops, custom cabinets, a built-in wine rack and outdoor access; a formal dining room; a guest suite with pocket doors, full bath and office; an en suite primary bedroom with dual walk-in closets, shower and tub; two additional spacious bedrooms; and a yard with privet hedges, a stone patio and an attached one-car garage, on 0.16 acres. Patti Anderson; William Pitt/Julia B Fee Sotheby’s International Realty, 917-664-5763; williampitt.com
Taxes
$26,433 a year
Pros
Closet space and natural light are abundant. The home is on the corner of a quiet street at the entrance of a cul-de-sac.
Cons
The basement is not completely finished. The kitchen’s eat-in area is a little tight.
